com.googlecode.javacpp

Class BuildMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.googlecode.javacpp.BuildMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo

    public class BuildMojo
extends AbstractMojo
    A Maven Mojo to call the Builder (Java class -> C++ JNI -> native library). Can also be seen as an example of how to use the Builder programmatically.
    Author:
    Arnaud Nauwynck, Samuel Audet
    Is defined by the goal name:
    build
    Is bound to the specified phase of the standard build lifecycle:
    process-classes
